net.sf.jclec.problem.util.dataset.instance

Class Instance

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.problem.util.dataset.instance.Instance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IInstance

    public class Instance
extends java.lang.Object
implements IInstance
    Implementation of the IInstance interface. The instance values for the attributes are stored in an array. The instance can be weighted to determine its importance within the dataset.
    Author:
    Amelia Zafra, Sebastian Ventura, Alberto Cano
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
